TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit DeleteAttachmentType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseRequestType

Docs.summary: The class represents a request to delete an attachment on an item in the Exchange database.

remarks.para: The DeleteAttachment operation returns the identifier and new change key of the item that held the attachment before it was deleted.

example.para: The following code example shows a DeleteItem request that deletes two attachments.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: The constructor initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::RequestAttachmentIdType ^> ^ AttachmentIds { cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::RequestAttachmentIdType ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::RequestAttachmentIdType ^> ^ value); };

Docs.summary: The property gets or sets the set of attachment identifiers that are used to identify the attachments to delete.
Docs.value: The property returns a array that identifies the set attachments to delete.
